title: Chicken Wontons in Spicy Chili Sauce

items: one 12-ounce bag frozen wontons (I like the mini chicken cilantro ones from Trader Joe’s or Costco)
1–2 cups chicken broth (depending on how soupy you like it)

steps: Heat 1 tablespoon sesame oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms; sauté until softened and yummy. Add garlic for the last minute or two of sautéing.
Add the frozen wontons, chicken broth, and teriyaki sauce. Simmer for 5 minutes, with a lid on, until the wontons are heated through.
Finish with remaining 2 tablespoons sesame oil, chili crisp, and top with sesame seeds and scallions.
